segments.text: I look at this kitchen and it's just gross with all that water spilling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing like a fountain gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading on the floor, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, her shoe must be wet and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate while ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing for cookies in this mess, ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbly, and now the floor's slippery too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water dripping down the cabinets, probably ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden's clean, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies amid this slop is unappealing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a domestic disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off that faucet before it's a swamp in there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene turns my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably next to get splashed.
segments.speaker: PAR
